reviews.text: This is the first time I've written a review on one of these sites, but I was compelled to tell others about how great my experience was here. We were referred to HRL by a South African friend, who said the lodge was an economical yet wonderful way to visit a game reserve while in South Africa. We'd had little time to consider other options, so we weren't quite sure what we were getting into.
reviews.title: Fantastic Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We could not have been happier with our experience. After an initial snafu, which the hotel more than made up for with complementary services, the stay was fantastic. The food was excellent: home baked bread and local game abounded, with three course meals for dinner, hot breakfasts, and "tea" that was hearty.
reviews.title: Left early since we found it so bad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a single guide accompany us on all our safaris, which made the experience feel much more intimate. We also didn't have to hear the same information about animals over and over again. We also rented mountain bikes and had an incredible ride through False Bay Park, which is close to the HRL property.
reviews.title: A splendid lodge
Amazing Place to Stay!
reviews.text: It struck us as quite difficult to find a lodge for safari experiences that was both luxurious and not over the top expensive. I think HRL is it, and we are forever grateful to our South African friend for the recommendation.
